==Translingual==

===Etymology===
Originally {{Han compound|止|t1=foot|一|ls=ic}} – a foot (止) running into a wall or barrier (一), indicating lack, incomplete. Compare {{m|mul|正||complete|sc=Hani}}.

Present form cursive simplification: 止 simplified to [[之]], 一 changed to [[丿]]; compare semi-cursive [[疋]].

===Han character===
